comments.raw_text: The spell checker thinks "de-emphasize" is a misspelling. The corrections it gives are absolute nonsense (e.g. "ed-emphasize").  Maybe something went wrong with the fix for bug 355178?
comments.author: jruderman@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: Nemeth: should we be using the compound syntax in the affix file to make Hunspell aware of such compounds separated by dashes?
